ranjeetbhatia1976 wrote:

>
> Hi all, I have edited the simple profile by adding overrides for a
> particular domain. In the override I just modified certain scope
> parameters such as I reduced max-hop-links from the default value of 5
> to 4. I save the profile - no problems.
>
> But as soon as I try to create a new job based on this profile I get
> the following error. I am using version 1.2.0 and interacting with
> application only with the WUI. Any help will be greatly
> appriciated....

You might check the files under YOUR_NEW_PROFILE/settings -- the 
location under which snippets of xml that represent the override are 
ketp -- with something like xmllint to ensure the xml snippets written 
to disk by Heritrix were well-formed.  In the past we've written bad xml 
and this may be your issue. You could also try moving aside the 
'setting's directory that is under your new profile and see if then new 
jobs can be created successfully from your new profile -- this will at 
least isolate the problem as something to do w/ settings directory content.

St.Ack

>
> Many thanks.
>
